text: In biology, an organism is said to be cosmopolitan (or cosmopolite) if it can be found almost anywhere on the Earth. Examples include: *Humans * House dust mite * Red admiral (painted lady butterfly) * Many cetacean species, including the orca * Brown rat * Peregrine falcon ==Related pages== *Biogeography *Endemic Category:Habitats Category:Ecology
title: Cosmopolitan distribution
